title: Settling Estates - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/10/22
itunes:title: Settling Estates - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/10/22
description:
George Noory and financial planner David Edey discuss strategies for settling estates after a parent or spouse dies, what to do when there is no written will or instructions on how to distribute assets, and how people's sense of entitlement to money can tear families apart.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
George Noory and financial planner David Edey discuss strategies for settling estates after a parent or spouse dies, what to do when there is no written will or instructions on how to distribute assets, and how people's sense of entitlement to money can tear families apart.
